title: #138 - Yakov Smirnoff & ME
description: Comedian Yakov Smirnoff & I hang out at his office in Branson, Missouri w/ my crew & talk about the Soviet Union, doing comedy in the Soviet Union, his move to the US, the Comedy Store and his move to LA, the fall of Communism, his career, and  of course I mention the Machine Story.
